SourceString: 10% Faster movement speed with 1 hand weapons
50% bonus damage from behind when using their native weapons
Zoom in to target distant foes
Holding the bow drawn drains stamina and reduces accuracy
Reloading requires you to stand still
Low health and stamina for a melee fighter
Has throwing weapons that are also effective in melee
Equip the largest weapons with no movement speed penalty
Deals significant damage while rushing forward
Healing and reviving players charges item
Damage absorbed by player charges item
Excels when mixing support, ranged and melee actions
Headshots from ranged or thrown weapons charge item
Hearty drumstick that can replenish health if consumed during a battlecry. Alternatively, used as a projectile to finish off fleeing enemies.
Dealing damage to multiple opponents with one swing charges item
Access to powerful weapons with long reach
Opponents are never downed, always killed by melee hits
